message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it from me for $9000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob! I can meet you halfway between our last two offers. How about we discuss $9200?
I appreciate the effort to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $7500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8000?
